overview:
Rachael Sperling is in her senior year at the University of Texas at Austin, working toward a Bachelor of Science in Public Relations with a concentration in Business. Rachael is serving her second year as President of the Alan Scott Chapter of Public Relations Student Society of America and has served as Vice President and Events Director of PRSSA. With the assistance and teamwork of the executive board, Rachael began the first ever biannual PRSSA networking event, Longhorn Networking and the Chapter Incentive Program.

In the summer of 2012, she interned as a Southwest Airlines NoLimits intern in Dallas, TX and currently interning on the Consumer PR team at Whole Foods Headquarters in Austin, TX.

Rachael enjoys the outdoors, traveling, cooking and dining out, writing for her food blog, and meeting new and interesting people. She hopes to graduate in May 2013 and pursue a career in public relations in Austin, San Francisco or wherever the best opportunity lies!

degrees.subject: Public Relations
degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
